summary: SPX chart endpoint testing completed successfully. All SPX chart features working correctly including real OHLC data from spx_candles collection, proper 'pts' formatting, realistic SPX price ranges, SMA200 line, and phase zones display. BTC chart regression testing also passed.
passed_tests: SPX chart endpoint (GET /api/fractal/v2.1/chart?symbol=SPX) returns 200 status with 450 candles
SPX chart endpoint returns real OHLC data from spx_candles collection (19,242 candles loaded)
SPX price range is realistic (5142-5325 from API, 4641-7450 displayed on Y-axis)
Response structure includes all required fields: symbol, tf, candles, sma200, phaseZones, count
Phase zones returned (7 zones from API)
Chart canvas renders SPX data properly
Y-axis displays realistic SPX range (4000-8000) - shows 4,641 to 7,450
Hover tooltips show OHLC in correct 'pts' format (6,701 pts, 6,390 pts, etc.)
SMA200 line is visible as blue line on chart
Phase zones are displayed (ACCUMULATION zone with green background visible)
Horizon switching functional (7D, 14D buttons found and clickable)
No error messages found on SPX page
BTC chart regression test passed - endpoint returns 450 candles
BTC page still uses $ format correctly (not pts)
BTC chart canvas renders properly with no errors
